video_prompt: The video features Hatsune Miku, an anime character, playing the guitar and singing in a recording studio. She is seated on a chair, with her feet resting on a cushioned surface. The background includes various musical equipment and a cozy, modern studio setting. The character is singing and playing the guitar, with the camera capturing her from different angles. The ambient sound is the sound of singing.

speech_prompt.speaker: Hatsune Miku
speech_prompt.text: Look over here, girl, look over here, look over here, the show here is really great. Don't pretend to ignore it.
